data.title: PsrPopPy: Pulsar Population Modelling Programs in Python
data.name: PsrPopPy
data.description: Python implementation of PSRPOP, designed to be run from the command line or from Python scripts/interpreter

evidence: README indicates network usage: "The main external requirements are [matplotlib](matplotlib.sourceforge.net) and [wxPython](http://wxpython.org/), which are used for the visualization stuff. It has a very useful API for making simple"
"Python implementation of PSRPOP (which was written by D Lorimer)." (describes a domain-specific pulsar population tool, not a generic library)
"A brief description of the "executables" follows." followed by commands like `populate`, `evolve`, `dosurvey` (indicating end-user programs for scientific tasks)
